remarks: If a number is less then another number, and the other number is less than or equal to a third number, the first number is less than the third number.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 24-Mar-2018.)
statement:
lelttrdi.r $e |- ( ph -> ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ C e. RR ) ) $.
lelttrdi.l $e |- ( ph -> B <_ C ) $.
lelttrdi $p |- ( ph -> ( A < B -> A < C ) ) $.
